oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-09-21 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 21, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performer Dave Rich, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, Rod Brasfield, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 937th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rod Brasfield; Dave Rich; Del Wood; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Porter Wagoner introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Porter Wagoner) -- Prince Albert commercial (Porter Wagoner, Grant Turner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Porter Wagoner introduces Dave Rich -- Chicken House (Dave Rich) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Del Wood -- Rainbow (Del Wood) -- Porter Wagoner talks -- I Thought I Heard You Calling My Name (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Hayes, Red; Wagoner, Porter; Rich, Dave, 1936-
